channel.title: Final-Revolution 637/639 | New | Summoning | Hunter | Economic | Curses | Nex
channel.description:
[b]Final Revolution: Where our goal is to fulfill your dreams.[/b]
[b]SITE[/b] http://www.final-revolution.com
[b]PLAY[/b] Webclient (REQUIRES JRE OR JDK7): http://www.final-reovlution.com/play.html DL Client (REQUIRES JRE6): http://www.mediafire.com/?4vm7w0e0g2n0eln DL Client (REQUIRES JRE7): http://www.mediafire.com/?x3flfsw832yr93t
[b]Purpose[/b]: Our purpose for Final-Revolution, was to end our RuneScape Private Server Days, knowing we fulfilled everyones dreams. This project started with a group of close friends, who were from the community UnRealScape. We all wanted to make a project together. Thus creating the server, Final-Revolution. A server that is backed from a previous owner of UnRealScape/FrugooScape Sir Lethal.
[b]Server Features [/b]24/7 VPS hosted on a Dual Core CPU w/ 4 Gigs of ram Weekly Updates Tormented Demons Perfected Combat System Multiple Minigames Full working duel arena ALL skills work except Farming HD Graphics Nex Corporal Beast Construction skill works Godwars 100% working slayer tasks Donator benefits Skilling areas throughout the entire server LRC caves with rocktail fishing Castle Wars Lunars, Ancients, Curses
[b]Staff: [/b]The current staff is only consisted of three people. These people are, Sir Lethal, Fox and Rebirth. Sir Lethal and Fox are the owners and coders of the server. They give it their 110% to make sure everyone is always happy. Rebirth is the only Forum Moderator, He started out as a Super Moderator because the owners knew his capabilities. If theres an issue on the Forum, go to him.
[b]The Server: [/b]Final-Revolution is a 637 loading 639 Cache server. We strive to bring you the greatest near-runescape features. We release updates every week, we want to make sure you stay addicted to our server. There is always something to do on Final-Revolution
Pictures: [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2wnwqb6.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/summonning.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/slayertower.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/skillcape.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/duelarena.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/curses.jpg[/img] http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/Castlewars.jpg [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/summonningdialg.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/lrccave.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/cnstruction.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1060.photobucket.com/albums/t442/Finalrsps/bank.jpg[/img]

item.title: Final-Revolution 637/639 | New | Summoning | Hunter | Economic | Curses | Nex
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Lethal Sir Lethal
item.description:
@Sir_Lethal wrote:

Final Revolution:
Where our goal is to fulfill your dreams.

SITE
http://www.final-revolution.com

PLAY
Webclient (REQUIRES JRE OR JDK7): http://www.final-reovlution.com/play.html
DL Client (REQUIRES JRE6): http://www.mediafire.com/?4vm7w0e0g2n0eln
DL Client (REQUIRES JRE7): http://www.mediafire.com/?x3flfsw832yr93t

Purpose:
Our purpose for Final-Revolution, was to end our RuneScape Private Server Days,
knowing we fulfilled everyones dreams. This project started with a group of close friends,
who were from the community UnRealScape. We all wanted to make a project together.
Thus creating the server, Final-Revolution. A server that is backed from a previous owner of UnRealScape/FrugooScape Sir Lethal.

Server Features
24/7 VPS hosted on a Dual Core CPU w/ 4 Gigs of ram
Weekly Updates
Tormented Demons
Perfected Combat System
Multiple Minigames
Full working duel arena
ALL skills work except Farming
HD Graphics
Nex
Corporal Beast
Construction skill works
Godwars
100% working slayer tasks
Donator benefits
Skilling areas throughout the entire server
LRC caves with rocktail fishing
Castle Wars
Lunars, Ancients, Curses

Staff:
The current staff is only consisted of three people.
These people are, Sir Lethal, Fox and Rebirth.
Sir Lethal and Fox are the owners and coders of the server.
They give it their 110% to make sure everyone is always happy.
Rebirth is the only Forum Moderator, He started out as a Super Moderator because
the owners knew his capabilities. If theres an issue on the Forum, go to him.

The Server:
Final-Revolution is a 637 loading 639 Cache server.
We strive to bring you the greatest near-runescape features.
We release updates every week, we want to make sure you stay addicted to our server.
There is always something to do on Final-Revolution
